title: Natural language processing to identify suicidal ideation and anhedonia in major depressive disorder
details: LA Vance, L Way, D Kulkarni, EOC Palmer, A Ghosh… - BMC Medical Informatics …, 2025
abstract: Background Anhedonia and suicidal ideation are symptoms of major depressive disorder (MDD) that are not regularly captured in structured scales but may be captured in unstructured clinical notes. Natural language processing (NLP) …
